channel.title: War Chris Author Matiss on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in War Chris Author Matiss on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: bubba ho-tep
item.description: On saturday night, matiss and I went to bubba ho-tep. it was really great. chris said it was perfect - and I have to partially agree with him. it was damned close. all I knon is that now being monday morning.. I am ready for some A C T - I O N. ;)i am really sleepy last night. for some reason I just didn’t sleep well. stupid well. i am reading a book called “With Charity Toward None: A fond look at misanthropy.
